content: 1 and pull through as described in first round third round 1 ch3 double_crochet into next 4 sts cs 2 double_crochet into next 7 sts cs work row 2 two more times 3 double_crochet into next 2 sts 4 join to top of ch3 from row 1 and pull through fourth round thank you for crocheting with me follow me on instagram casapinka 1 ch3 double_crochet into next 6 sts cs follow me on facebook casapinka 2 double_crochet into next 11 sts cs email casapinka2@yahoo com work row 2 two more times 3 double_crochet into next 4 sts 4 join to top of ch3 from row 1 cut yarn and pull end all the way through sew in ends wet or steam block before crocheting together more instructions to come the blanket of calm casapinka 2
